      • askInteger

        Write a String to System.out, then read a String from System.in and convert it to Integer
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • askInt

        public static int askInt(java.lang.String question)
        Write a String to System.out, then read a String from System.in and convert it to int. If the read String is empty, read again.
        Parameters:
        question - the String to write
        Returns:
        the last read line converted to int

      • askIndexChoice

        public static java.lang.Integer askIndexChoice(java.lang.String question,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleAnswers)
        Write a String to System.out, then write the Elements of a List to System.out with leading number in the Format "(i+1) " + list[i]. Then read a String vom System.in, convert it to int and subtract 1. This int is the index of the chosen element of possibleAnswers
        Parameters:
        question - the String to write first
        possibleAnswers - the list to write to output with leading numbers
        Returns:
        the index of the chosen value

      • askIndexChoice

        public static java.lang.Integer askIndexChoice(java.lang.String question,
                               java.lang.String[] possibleAnswers)
        Write a String to System.out, then write the Elements of a String[] to System.out with leading number in the Format "(i+1) " + list[i]. Then read a String vom System.in, convert it to int and subtract 1. This int is the index of the chosen element of possibleAnswers
        Parameters:
        question - the String to write first
        possibleAnswers - the list to write to output with leading numbers
        Returns:
        the index of the chosen value

      • askBool

        public static boolean askBool(java.lang.String question)
        Write a String to System.out, then read a String from System.in and read a boolean Value from it
        Parameters:
        question - the String to write
        Returns:
        true if the read String is in {"Y","y",""}

        Returns:
        the read line
